item.description:
Go back in time to Robin Hood’s
Springtime Festival

History Repeats Itself...
May 23 - 2010 (Rain or Shine)
10:00 am to 6:00 pm

Our Meet Up will be on May 23rd.

http://www.ctfaire.co...

www.ctfaire.com/spring/

Hours & Directions link Includes a diagram of the Fair
Grounds.

http://www.guilfordfa...

www.guilfordfair.org/hours_directions.htm

Guilford Fair Grounds

Lovers Lane
Guilford, CT 06437
(203) 453-3543

http://www.guilfordfa...

www.guilfordfair.org/

Attendance Fee is

General Admission (13+): $14*
Youth Admission (5-12): $7*
Child Admission (4 and under): $ FREE

http://www.ctfaire.co...

www.ctfaire.com/spring/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=32&Itemid=56


Other Renaissance Events & Issues:

@
New York Renaissance Faire
Saturdays, Sundays & Labor Day
Aug.7 - Sept. 26, 2010
Sterling Forest • 10am – 7pm
Tuxedo Park, NY • Ph: 845.351.5171

Does anyone want to go there and
If so then when do you want to go?
This will need to be an over night trip.

http://www.renfair.co...

www.renfair.com/NY/


@
Hebron Renaissance Fair

Sep 25, 26 & Oct 2, 3, 9, 10, 11,
16, 17, 23, 24 - 2010 (Rain or Shine)

http://www.ctfaire.co...

www.ctfaire.com/fall/

http://culturemob.com...

culturemob.com/events/5879808-connecticut-renaissance-faire-ct-hebron-hebron-ct-venue

We will have a Meet Up going here in 2010.
I have not yet decided what day to go. Probably make that
Decision around late August to early September.

@
Renaissance Magazine can be found in Barnes and Noble,
as well as some other book stores.

Renaissance Magazine

http://www.renaissanc...

www.renaissancemagazine.com/

Costumes are not needed to attend the Renaissance Faire.
Comfortable clothes for walking around and your sense of humor
Are what is best to bring.
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes or Maybe. Car Pooling is possible.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone: Time Travel’s to Guilford Renaissance Faire on May 23
